about_the_game: Cross of the Dutchman is a project that developed over a long period of time. The project started in 2009, and since that time up until the release in 2015, a lot of artwork and material was produced to create the visuals and style for Cross of the Dutchman. This Artbook is a collection of materials that were produced for the project, and give an insight into the development process.
